mapper.select: select MODEL_ID_, DESCRIBED_VARIABLE_, DATA_ from PREDICTION_MODEL where NAME_ = #{parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into PREDICTION_MODEL ( MODEL_ID_, DESCRIBED_VARIABLE_, DATA_) values ( #{modelId}, #{describedVariable}, #{data} )
mapper.update: update PREDICTION_MODEL set MODEL_ID_ = #{modelId}, DESCRIBED_VARIABLE_ = #{describedVariable}, DATA_ = #{DATA} where MODEL_ID_ = #{modelId}, DESCRIBED_VARIABLE_ = #{describedVariable}
